about_the_game:
ENTER THE ARENA

Project Fireball unites the best of the heart-pounding world of sports with the show-stopping power of magic to create a lawless footbrawl-like battle arena game. A roster of first-class heroes are dying to unleash their ultimate superpowers to help you crush your opponents! Let none stand in your way to the top, but watch out—there is no mercy in the arena. Anything goes.

2 V 2 REAL-TIME BATTLES

Think you and your team have what it takes to become Project Fireball champions? All you need to do is fight tooth and nail through the other team’s defenses (no sweat) to score goals in their net (nothing to it). Use any means necessary—the environment, your super abilities, and your skills— and remember: the best defense is an aggressive offense.

FUTURISTIC FANTASY ARCADE FOOTBRAWL

Get ready for the event of the century in a futuristic open-air arena with the most heroic of heroes, each with their own twisted super abilities. Transform the ball into an unstoppable charge of energy and score. This is the height of entertainment.

FUN AND SERIOUS GAME

All champions have to start somewhere, so don’t take it too hard when you’re obliterated by your opponents. Get back up and start strategizing with your teammates. Whether you’re looking to master the world of Project Fireball or are a curious casual who just wants to pull off some wild stunts, you’re in the right place.

BORN IN FRANCE, RAISED WORLDWIDE

Project Fireball is brought to you by the brilliant minds of a small but mighty international group in France who can’t wait to see everyone duking it out in the arena in a display of guts and glory.

Keep in touch by joining Project Fireball’s official Discord, and "wishlist" and "follow" on Steam for all the hottest news.

name: Project Fireball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bits)
  • Processor: Dual-core, e.g., Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon™ RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Let’s get ready to rumble! Take to the arena in the one and only Project Fireball, a rowdy fantasy-arcade footbrawl game where there are no rules. Choose your hero and use their super abilities to show everyone who’s boss in epic 2v2 matches.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
